EvaluateDisplayText(User, WorldObject)

Using the sequence associate or an override, evaluate the display text and replace {{foo}} tokens (dialog template variables) with values from the ephemeral store.

Declaration
public string EvaluateDisplayText(User target, WorldObject AssociateOverride = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
User target

The user who is receiving the dialog
WorldObject AssociateOverride

The associate override, if any, to use as a source for token data
Returns
Type Description
System.String

An evaluated string

GetScript(WorldObject)

Gets the script responsible for handling events. This can be either an associate (e.g. an NPC), an override, or a global script (set by a dialog's sequence). Associate override first, then associate, and lastly, a global script.

Declaration
protected Script GetScript(WorldObject AssociateOverride = null)
